article_title: Can Cloud Technology Fix The Health Care System?

article_metadata.description: By Todd Rothenhaus, MD  It’s no secret that the U.S. health care system is broken. It’s plagued with splintered information, wasteful duplication, and a severe lack of insight into the health of a patient, or population of patients. If you've ever sat in a hospital waiting room, filling out a paper [...]
